description.narrative: Strengthened national capacity in child-centered disaster risk reduction and risk-informed planning, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Disaster Risk Reduction, Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, there is an inclusive and protective legal and policy environment and improved state accountability for the realization of children's rights

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened national capacity in child-centered disaster risk reduction and risk-informed planning

description.narrative: Children benefited from the government's specific actions to enhance community resilience in alignment with the SDGs and Sendai Framework, including law reform, a partnership framework on DRR, and public advocacy for awareness raising at national to community levels. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Existence of Child sensitive national or local risk management plans addressing risks related to disasters, climate change, conflict, public health emergencies or other crises

baseline.value: No provincial child sensitive and risk management plan in Ninh Thuan province.

target.value: 2021:Existence of Ninh Thuan provincial child sensitive and risk management plan.

actual.value: 2019:UNICEF provided support to the Government to amend the Law on Natural Disaster Prevention and control with stronger focus on drisk management and preparedness, community resilience and accountability towards the vulnerable people including children. Climate change and disaster risk as well as impact

title.narrative: Availability of capacity building strategy and subsequent action plan developed and implemented by Directorate General of Natural Disaster Prevention and Control.

target.value: 2020:Availability of a road map and tools to roll out the safe and clean community initiative.
